name: Noir (Benilde GameDev)
description:
NOTE: Xbox Controller Recommended (other control options explained at the end of description)

Noir is a stealth-based adventure game heavily inspired by film noir and dystopian works.

Set in a dystopian city. Society has been split into two, one side given a comfortable yet monotonous life, while the other lives in poverty while being constantly hunted down by the government.

You control two characters representing the two sides: Edmond, a privileged yet directionless man, and Lilian, a girl who had lived her life under an oppressive rule, as they navigate the hostile city streets in order to return Lilian back to her home.

Capstone 2, Term 3, AY 2016-2017

Keyboard Controls:
WASD - Movement/Rotate Character While Aiming
Mouse - Camera Rotation
Q - Switch Characters
E - Interact
H - Toggle Stop/Move Characters
Y - Heal Character

Tab - Open Objectives
Middle Mouse Button - Aim Bottle
Right Click - Aim Stun Gun
Left Mouse Button - Throw Bottle/Shoot Stun Gun
